summary:
This is a retexture for the Longbow , Wich normaly is simple plain wood with a rugged string .
<br />Ive made some major improvments !
descriptionHtml:
[size=6] Project I.R.O.N [/size]

[size=5]Longbow Re-texture " Project [/size]I.R.O.N[size=5] " ,[/size]
[size=5]The longbow was to simple for me , Just a plank of wood with string !
[/size]
[size=5]No Fear - Project I.R.O.N is here !![/size]
[i][u]
[/u][/i][i][u][size=5][color=#ff0000][color=#f1c232]==============([/color] [color=#6aa84f]String Update is here ![/color] [color=#BF9000])[/color][/color][color=#BF9000]================[/color]

INFO :

2K[/size][/u][/i]
[size=3][u][u]Celtic inlays on the front of the bow[/u]
Parralex Inlays ( celtic ) , String protector and Bow[/u]
[u]Brand new alpha template[/u][u]
More color and diversion[/u]
[u][b]Real wood grip 
[/b][/u]Iron String protector with celtic inlay
[/size]

[size=3]With the best regards :[/size]
[size=5]Reckless Genesis [/size]
author: Reckless Genesis
